config.name: mcstas
config.values: {"Face": "\"TS1_S01_Maps.mcstas\"", "E0": "E_min", "E1": "E_max", "modPosition": 0, "xw": 0.12, "yh": 0.12, "focus_xw": 0.094, "focus_yh": 0.094, "dist": 1.7, "mcstas_component": "ViewModISIS", "mcstas_order": 1, "mcstas_extend": "char eniius_data[] =\n\\\"{'function_pulse_shape': \\\n{'type':'NXnote', 'value': { \\\n'data': '\\\ndef mcstas_time_profile(Face, Ei):<nl>\\\n<tb>with open(Face, <qt>r<qt>) as f:<nl>\\\n<tb><tb>dat = f.read().replace(<qt>(<qt>,<qt><qt>).replace(<qt>)<qt>,<qt><qt>).split(<qt><bs>n<qt>)<nl>\\\n<tb>id0, en, intens = (dat.index(<qt> time <qt>), [], [])<nl>\\\n<tb>n = dat.index(<qt> time <qt>, id0 + 1) - id0 - 6<nl>\\\n<tb># time data originally in ns, energy in MeV<nl>\\\n<tb>t = np.loadtxt(dat[(id0+1):(id0+n)], usecols=(0)) / 100<nl>\\\n<tb>dt = np.diff(t)<nl>\\\n<tb>while True:<nl>\\\n<tb><tb>e0 = np.loadtxt(dat[id0-2].split()[2:5:2]) * 1.e9<nl>\\\n<tb><tb>i0 = np.loadtxt(dat[(id0+1):(id0+n)], usecols=(1))<nl>\\\n<tb><tb>en.append(np.mean(e0))<nl>\\\n<tb><tb>intens.append((i0[:-1] / dt) / (e0[1] - e0[0]))<nl>\\\n<tb><tb>try:<nl>\\\n<tb><tb><tb>id0 = dat.index(<qt> time <qt>, id0 + 1)<nl>\\\n<tb><tb>except ValueError:<nl>\\\n<tb><tb><tb>break<nl>\\\n<tb>en, intens, tlog = (np.log(en), np.array(intens), np.log(t))<nl>\\\n<tb>kp = np.where(t < 2000)[0]<nl>\\\n<tb>ie = np.where(en < np.log(Ei))[0][-1]<nl>\\\n<tb>frac = (np.log(Ei) - en[ie]) / (en[ie+1] - en[ie])<nl>\\\n<tb>return intens[ie,kp] + frac * (intens[ie+1,kp] - intens[ie,kp])<nl>',\\\n'globals': 'np:numpy, open:open, ValueError:ValueError',\\\n'type': 'text/x-python', \\\n'description': 'Python script to compute moderator time profile from Ei'} \\\n}}\\\";\n"}

config.name: data
config.values:
def mcstas_time_profile(Face, Ei):
    with open(Face, 'r') as f:
        dat = f.read().replace('(','').replace(')','').split('\n')
    id0, en, intens = (dat.index(' time '), [], [])
    n = dat.index(' time ', id0 + 1) - id0 - 6
    # time data originally in ns, energy in MeV
    t = np.loadtxt(dat[(id0+1):(id0+n)], usecols=(0)) / 100
    dt = np.diff(t)
    while True:
        e0 = np.loadtxt(dat[id0-2].split()[2:5:2]) * 1.e9
        i0 = np.loadtxt(dat[(id0+1):(id0+n)], usecols=(1))
        en.append(np.mean(e0))
        intens.append((i0[:-1] / dt) / (e0[1] - e0[0]))
        try:
            id0 = dat.index(' time ', id0 + 1)
        except ValueError:
            break
    en, intens, tlog = (np.log(en), np.array(intens), np.log(t))
    kp = np.where(t < 2000)[0]
    ie = np.where(en < np.log(Ei))[0][-1]
    frac = (np.log(Ei) - en[ie]) / (en[ie+1] - en[ie])
    return intens[ie,kp] + frac * (intens[ie+1,kp] - intens[ie,kp])

config.name: description
config.values: Python script to compute moderator time profile from Ei

config.name: mcstas
config.values: {"xmin": -0.047, "xmax": 0.047, "ymin": -0.047, "ymax": 0.047, "mcstas_component": "Slit", "mcstas_order": 2, "mcstas_extend": "char eniius_data[] =\n\\\"{'parameter_function': \\\n{'type':'NXnote', 'value': { \\\n'data': '\\\ndef scale_x_gap(Ei):<nl>\\\n<tb>l = np.sqrt(81.804201263673718 / np.array(ei))<nl>\\\n<tb>if l > 4.5:<nl>\\\n<tb><tb>gain = 11.9644283524285 + 3.3130483907728 * (l - 4.5)<nl>\\\n<tb>else:<nl>\\\n<tb><tb>gain = 1 + np.exp(-2.31186757913804 / l) * (23.2965476737752 + \\\n- 15.1289612048092 * l + 6.11185114079924 * l * l \\\n- 0.863318992430536 * l * l + 0.0439354263500835 * l * l * l)<nl>\\\n<tb>return gain<nl>\\\ndef scale_y_gap(Ei):<nl>\\\n<tb>return scale_x_gap(Ei)<nl>', \\\n'globals': 'np:numpy',\\\n'type': 'text/x-python', \\\n'description': 'Python script to compute aperture parameter from Ei'} \\\n}}\\\";\n"}
